tool_description: Let AI create an image for you. Send a description and size of the image and in response get a url to the created image.
name: AI Image Generator | Text to image
title: AI Image Generator | Text to image
tool_name: AI Image Generator | Text to image

api_list.name: Generate image
api_list.description:
This endpoint takes a POST request with the required properties "description" and "size" and returns a url to your AI Generated Image. 

NOTE: This endpoint cannot accept a "description" property that contains explicit content.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-image-generator-text-to-image.p.rapidapi.com/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-image-generator-text-to-image.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-image-generator-text-to-image.p.rapidapi.com/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-image-generator-text-to-image.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
